name: CreateTeamDiscussionComment
description:
Create a new comment on a team discussion in an organization.

Use this tool to add a comment to an existing team discussion in a GitHub organization. This action requires appropriate permissions and will generate notifications. Be mindful of rate limits when using this tool.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization where the team discussion is located. This is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug identifier for the team name within the organization, used to specify which team's discussion to comment on.

value_schema.description: The slug of the team name.

parameters.name: discussion_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the specific discussion within the team to which you want to add a comment.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the discussion.

parameters.name: comment_body_text
parameters.description: The text content of the comment to be added to the team discussion.
